text:
Created attachment 27351
SSL_MODE_RELEASE_BUFFERS

The attached patch introduces usage of SSL_MODE_RELEASE_BUFFERS mode when available so  SSL connections use less memory..

See:

http://www.imperialviolet.org/2010/06/25/overclocking-ssl.html

Tested against 2.2 but the attached patch is against trunk.
creator: crrodriguez@opensuse.org
sf@sfritsch.de
text: committed to trunk as r1178079 (depending on MaxMemFree being set)
